Serena ChangeMan Mover Not Found

The command you selected requires a connection to an active installation of Serena ChangeMan Mover. If you have installed Mover, please verify that the Mover server is running and that you have correctly specified the URL to the Mover server in Version Manager (Admin | Mover Setup). See the Serena ChangeMan Mover Installation and Setup Guide for more information.

What is Serena ChangeMan Mover?

Serena ChangeMan Mover bridges the gap between your application development, and server distribution and publishing. With Serena ChangeMan Mover, you can automate the retrieval and deployment of your files and folders across your entire network. Based on the criteria you choose, Serena ChangeMan Mover extracts files from Serena ChangeMan Version Manager, Serena ChangeMan Dimensions, or the file system, and deploys them to any mixture of servers.

For More Information

Please contact us today to learn more about how Serena ChangeMan Mover can automate the retrieval and deployment of your files and folders across your entire network.

For more information, visit the Serena web site at http://www.serena.com.
